statements: SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE adherence_score > 80;
SELECT patient_id, dose_amount, dose_frequency FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_outcome FROM MedicationAdherence ORDER BY treatment_outcome DESC;
SELECT AVG(adherence_score) AS avg_adherence_score, medication_name FROM MedicationAdherence GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE adherence_score > 80 ORDER BY adherence_score DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dose_amount FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE dose_frequency = 'daily' AND treatment_outcome = 'successful' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT medication_name, AVG(adherence_score) AS average_adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, dose_amount, adherence_score FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE treatment_outcome IN ('improved', 'stable') ORDER BY patient_id ASC, adherence_score DESC;

SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dose_frequency, treatment_outcome FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE dose_amount >= 50 GROUP BY patient_id, medication_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_date FROM MedicationAdherence ORDER BY adherence_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dose_amount FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE dose_amount >= 5;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_date FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT treatment_type, outcome_score, outcome_date FROM TreatmentOutcomes ORDER BY outcome_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE adherence_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM MedicationAdherence ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT medication_name, adherence_date FROM MedicationAdherence WHERE dose_amount > 10 ORDER BY adherence_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentOutcomes WHERE outcome_score >= 80 AND outcome_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY outcome_score DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, outcome_score FROM TreatmentOutcomes ORDER BY treatment_type ASC, outcome_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT adherence_date, adherence_level FROM Adherence WHERE medication_id = 3 AND patient_id = 5 ORDER BY adherence_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, patient_name FROM Medications JOIN Patients ON Medications.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, adherence_date, missed_doses FROM Patients JOIN Adherence ON Patients.patient_id = Adherence.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY adherence_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, frequency, adherence_level FROM Medications JOIN Adherence ON Medications.medication_id = Adherence.medication_id WHERE adherence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY adherence_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE dosage = '10mg';
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN AdherenceRecords ON Patients.patient_id = AdherenceRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON AdherenceRecords.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE frequency='daily';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, AdherenceRecords.adherence_status FROM Patients JOIN AdherenceRecords ON Patients.patient_id = AdherenceRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Medications.medication_id = AdherenceRecords.medication_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Medications.medication_name, TreatmentOutcomes.outcome_description FROM Patients JOIN TreatmentOutcomes ON Patients.patient_id = TreatmentOutcomes.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Medications.medication_id = TreatmentOutcomes.medication_id ORDER BY Patients.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patient ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medication WHERE dosage = '500mg';
SELECT patient_id, patient_age FROM Patient WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentOutcome WHERE outcome_description LIKE '%good%';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patient WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19'
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patient INNER JOIN Medication ON Patient.patient_id = Medication.medication_id WHERE Medication.dosage = '10mg'

SELECT Patient.patient_name, TreatmentOutcome.outcome_description FROM Patient LEFT JOIN TreatmentOutcome ON Patient.patient_id = TreatmentOutcome.patient_id WHERE TreatmentOutcome.outcome_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM Visit
